name: Cattle Sorting
description:
A small project for a one week game jam. This game is based on a combination of team penning and cutting with a small roping section. The object is to sort the cows starting with the given number and you get a second chance and some extra time if you fail at any point.

This project was made for the 2022 SGDA Summer Game Jam in one week.
